title: Necromancer

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Raise a dead player and use their ability on another player at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You will learn any notifications the player that you use would receive.
- With the Necronomicon, you gain the ability to summon a ghoul each night, dealing a Basic Attack to a player.
- Taunt will not stop you from reanimating a dead player.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who would oppose the Coven.

desc:
Post 3865
*You know 3863 doesn't even have an attack value? It is literally just Survivor with no vests.*
